headline: Will Board Refresh and Bullish Coverage on AI Data Centers Change Digital Realty Trust’s (DLR) Narrative
summary: Earlier this month, Digital Realty Trust announced that Stephen R. Bolze will join its Board and Audit Committee from January 1, 2026, while Goldman Sachs began covering the company with a positive analyst view supported by its large development pipeline and backlog. These developments combine fresh board-level infrastructure expertise with growing institutional interest, underlining how AI-driven data center demand is becoming central to Digital Realty’s long-term story. Next, we’ll examine...
